Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of lake effect snow !  Firm groom this AM was covered this afternoon with 2 to 3 inches of fairly light snow resulting in a pleasant skiable skate deck . The  classic tracks look great and those skiers were moving fast . The best access is through Valley road dead end as the Lodge side is very busy with the downhill crowd .

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run will be open for skiing tomorrow but will not be groomed. The building will be open for its usual hours. The park says that the next possible groom date is January 2nd. At 3:30 today it's snowing really hard and the trail is filling in nicely. Might be a good classic day as the track is rock solid and once it's skied in a little bit it should be good. Not so sure about skating for tomorrow.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power tilled and tracked this morning. Conditions are excellent.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The local schools are closed for the day but the slopes are open with plenty of powder for all. Over 5 inches of snow landed at Nub's Nob last night. The majority of this snow came after we groomed so you will find fresh snow on the steeps today. Pintail Peak will get a fresh groom this morning and the beginner runs will be groomed a second time this morning if you prefer corduroy. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is cheesy cauliflower with ham. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Grab the wide skis and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
